game.description: Protect your bed and destroy the enemy beds. Upgrade yourself and your team by collecting Iron, Gold, Emerald and Diamond from generators to access powerful upgrades.
npc.shop.name: ITEM SHOP
npc.upgrade.name: UPGRADES
shop.inventory.quick_buy.title: Quick Buy
shop.inventory.blocks.title: Blocks
shop.inventory.melee.title: Melee
shop.inventory.armor.title: Armor
shop.inventory.tools.title: Tools
shop.inventory.ranged.title: Ranged
shop.inventory.potions.title: Potions
shop.inventory.utility.title: Utility
shop.inventory.separator.title: Categories
shop.missing: You don't have enought %name%! Need %amount% more!
item.gamestyle.title: Game style
item.gamestyle.lore:
Click to change the style
of the interfaces
item.iron.name: Iron
item.gold.name: Gold
item.diamond.name: Diamond
item.emerald.name: Emerald
item.wool.name: Wool
item.wool.lore:
Great for bridging across
islands. Turns into your team's
color.
item.hard_clay.name: Hardened Clay
item.hard_clay.lore: Basic block to defend your bed.
item.glass.name: Blast-Proof Glass
item.end_stone.name: End Stone
item.end_stone.lore: Solid block to defend your bed.
item.ladder.name: Ladder
item.ladder.lore:
Useful to save cats stuck in
trees.
item.wood.name: Wood
item.wood.lore:
Good block to defend your bed.
Strong against pickaxes.
item.obsidian.name: Obsidian
item.stone_sword.name: Stone Sword
item.iron_sword.name: Iron Sword
item.diamond_sword.name: Diamond Sword
item.stick.name: Stick (Knockback I)
item.chainmail_armor.name: Permanent Chainmail Armor
item.chainmail_armor.lore:
Chainmail leggings and boots
which you will always spawn
with.
item.iron_armor.name: Permanent Iron Armor
item.iron_armor.lore:
Iron leggings and boots which
you will always spawn with
item.diamond_armor.name: Permanent Diamond Armor
item.diamond_armor.lore:
Diamond leggings and boots which
you will always spawn with
item.shears.name: Permanent Shears
item.shears.lore:
Great to get rid of wool. You
will always spawn with these
shears.
item.pickaxe_tier1.name: Wooden Pickaxe (Efficiency I)
item.pickaxe_tier2.name: Iron Pickaxe (Efficiency II)
item.pickaxe_tier3.name: Gold Pickaxe (Efficiency III, Sharpness II)
item.pickaxe_tier4.name: Diamond Pickaxe (Efficiency III)
item.pickaxe.lore:
This is an upgradable item.
It will lose 1 tier upon death!

You will permanently respawn
with at least the lower tier.
item.axe_tier1.name: Wooden Axe (Efficiency I)
item.axe_tier2.name: Iron Axe (Efficiency I)
item.axe_tier3.name: Gold Axe (Efficiency II)
item.axe_tier4.name: Diamond Axe (Efficiency III)
item.axe.lore:
This is an upgradable item.
It will lose 1 tier upon death!

You will permanently respawn
with at least the lower tier.
item.arrow.name: Arrow
item.bow.name: Bow
item.bow_power.name: Bow (Power I)
item.bow_punch.name: Bow (Power I, Punch I)
item.potion_speed.name: Potion of Speed II (45 seconds)
item.potion_jump.name: Potion of Jump V (45 seconds)
item.potion_invisibility.name: Potion of Invisibility (30 seconds)
item.golden_apple.name: Golden Apple
item.bedbug.name: Bedbug
item.bedbug.lore:
Spawns silverfish where the
snowball lands to distract your
enemies. Lasts 15 seconds
item.dream_defender.name: Dream Defender
item.dream_defender.lore:
Iron Golem to help defend your
base. Lasts 4 minutes.
item.fireball.name: Fireball
item.fireball.lore:
Right-click to launch! Great to
knock back enemies walking on
thin bridges.
item.tnt.name: TNT
item.tnt.lore:
Instantly ignites, appropriate
to explode things!
item.ender_pearl.name: Ender Pearl
item.ender_pearl.lore:
The quickest way to invade enemy
bases.
item.water_bucket.name: Water Bucket
item.water_bucket.lore:
Great to slow down approaching
enemies. Can also protect
against TNT.
item.bridge_egg.name: Bridge Egg
item.bridge_egg.lore:
This egg creates a bridge in its
trail after being thrown.
item.magic_milk.name: Magic Milk
item.magic_milk.lore:
Avoid triggering traps for 30
seconds after consuming.
item.sponge.name: Sponge
item.compact_tower.name: Compact Pop-up Tower
inventory.upgrade.title: Upgrades & Traps
upgrade.sharpness.name: Sharpened Swords
upgrade.sharpness.lore:
Your team permanently gains
Sharpness I on all swords and axes!
upgrade.protection.name: Reinforced Armor
upgrade.protection.lore:
Your team permanently gains
Protection on all armor pieces!
upgrade.protection.tier_1.name: Protection I
upgrade.protection.tier_2.name: Protection II
upgrade.protection.tier_3.name: Protection III
upgrade.protection.tier_4.name: Protection IV
upgrade.miner.name: Maniac Miner
upgrade.miner.lore:
All players on your team
permanently gain Haste!
upgrade.miner.tier_1.name: Haste I
upgrade.miner.tier_2.name: Haste II
upgrade.forge.name: Iron Forge
upgrade.forge.lore:
Upgrade resource spawning on
your island!
upgrade.forge.tier_1.name: +50% Resources
upgrade.forge.tier_2.name: +100% Resources
upgrade.forge.tier_3.name: Spawn emeralds
upgrade.forge.tier_4.name: +200% Resources
upgrade.heal_pool.name: Heal Pool
upgrade.heal_pool.lore:
Creates a Regeneration field
around your base!
upgrade.dragon.name: Dragon Buff
upgrade.dragon.lore:
Your team will have 2 dragons
instead of 1 during deathmatch!
trap.blindness.name: It's a trap!
trap.blindness.lore:
Inflicts Blindness and Slowness
for 8 seconds
trap.counter_offensive.name: Counter-Offensive Trap
trap.counter_offensive.lore:
Grants Speed II and Jump Boost
II for 15 seconds to allied
players near your base.
trap.alarm.name: Alarm Trap
trap.alarm.lore:
Reveals invisible players as
well as their name and team.
trap.miner_fatigue.name: Miner Fatigue Trap
no-trap.title: Trap #%number%:
no-trap.lore:
Le %word% ennemi qui vient
dans votre base déclenchera ce
piège!
no-trap.sub_lore:
Acheter un piège le stockera
ici. Son coût sera proportionnel
au nombre de pièges stockés.
trap.title: TRAP TRIGGERED!
trap.subtitle: Your %trap% has been triggered!
trap.alarm.title: ALARM!!!
trap.alarm.subtitle: Alarm trap set off by %team% team!
bed.broken.title: Bed Broken!
bed.broken.subtitle: Your bed is broken!
